position: IIT KHARAGPUR • Tata Digital, Betterplace, Housing

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: •	Researching and monitoring industry developments and client base for identifying new product avenues.•	Coordinating with other departments for establishing technology, design, and product development strategy. •	Assessing market competition. •	Determining the needs of customers through research and making recommendations based thereon. •	Support launching a product in the market by evaluating product requirements.•	Deciding product pricing by using market research data.

experience.title: Team Member, Outgoing global volunteer
experience.description: AIESEC is an international youth-run, non-governmental and not-for-profit organization that provides young people with leadership development, cross-cultural internships, and global volunteer exchange experiences. The organization focuses on empowering young people to make a progressive social impact.
experience.description_html: AIESEC is an international youth-run, non-governmental and not-for-profit organization that provides young people with leadership development, cross-cultural internships, and global volunteer exchange experiences. The organization focuses on empowering young people to make a progressive social impact. <!---->

experience.title: Associate Member
experience.description: Spring Fest, known as SF, is the annual social and cultural festival of the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur.As an Associate member, I single-handedly led a team of 12 campus ambassadors from different colleges in the North region resulting in a 10% increase in the number of participants. Involved in dealing with media and newspapers with 5 positive newspaper articles being printed in northeastern states. I visited 8 colleges in Uttar Pradesh and talked to the dean/director of each for publicity purposes.

Involved in dealing with media and newspapers with 5 positive newspaper articles being printed in northeastern states.
